title: MS Agriculture and Farmland Wind-Tower Protection Act of 2026; create.
subject: Energy

actions.description: Title Suff Do Pass Comm Sub

extras.summary: AN ACT TO CREATE THE MISSISSIPPI AGRICULTURAL AND FARMLAND WIND-TOWER PROTECTION ACT OF 2026; TO PROVIDE THE LEGISLATIVE FINDING AND PURPOSE OF THIS ACT; TO DEFINE RELEVANT TERMS; TO PROVIDE THE MISSISSIPPI PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION WITH THE AUTHORITY AND JURISDICTION TO OVERSEE THE PLACEMENT, CONSTRUCTION, EXPANSION, OPERATION AND ENFORCEMENT OF WIND-TOWER FACILITIES IN THE STATE; TO PROVIDE CONSIDERATIONS THE COMMISSION SHALL USE TO DETERMINE IF A WIND-TOWER FACILITY SHOULD BE APPROVED; TO PROVIDE GROUNDS FOR DENIAL OF A WIND-TOWER FACILITY; TO REQUIRE THAT WIND-TOWER FACILITIES MAY ONLY BE CONSTRUCTED, INSTALLED OR OPERATED WITH THE COMMISSION'S APPROVAL; TO REQUIRE A PERSON OR ENTITY TO OBTAIN A PERMIT FROM THE COMMISSION TO CONSTRUCT OR OPERATE A WIND-TOWER FACILITY; TO ESTABLISH SETBACK AND PLACEMENT REQUIREMENTS FOR WIND-TOWER FACILITIES; TO PROVIDE THAT ANY PERSON OR ENTITY THAT DESIRES TO DEVELOP A WIND-TOWER FACILITY, MUST FIRST POST A DECOMMISSIONING BOND WORTH THE ESTIMATED COST OF TOWER REMOVAL AND LAND RESTORATION; TO CREATE THE WIND-TOWER AGRICULTURAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS STUDY COMMITTEE; TO PROVIDE THE COMPOSITION AND DUTIES OF THE STUDY COMMITTEE; TO PROVIDE PENALTIES FOR FAILING TO COMPLY WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THIS ACT; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
